results.description: Leeds United goalkeeper Kiko Casilla is granted extra time to respond to allegations that he racially abused Charlton Athletic's Jonathan Leko.
results.shortTitle: Casilla gets more time for racism charge
results.title: Kiko Casilla: Leeds United goalkeeper given extra time to respond to racism allegations

results.description: Patrick Bamford scores his first goal since August as promotion-chasing Leeds United hold out for victory over Blackburn.
results.shortTitle: Bamford ends goal drought as Leeds win
results.title: Leeds United 2-1 Blackburn Rovers: Patrick Bamford scores for first time since August as hosts win

results.description: Poland international midfielder Mateusz Klich signs a new four-and-a-half-year contract with Championship club Leeds United.
results.shortTitle: Klich agrees new long-term Leeds deal
results.title: Mateusz Klich: Poland midfielder signs new long-term deal with Leeds United

results.description: Garry Monk says his values will always be key as he looks to return to the Premier League with Sheffield Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Ambition driving Monk on at Wednesday
results.title: Garry Monk: Ambition drives on Sheffield Wednesday boss

results.description: Leeds United goalkeeper Kiko Casilla "strenuously denies" a Football Association charge of racial abuse.
results.shortTitle: Leeds' Casilla denies racial abuse charge
results.title: Kiko Casilla: Leeds United goalkeeper denies racial abuse charge

results.description: Jack Harrison scores one and makes another as Leeds United beat Queens Park Rangers to go top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Leeds return top with win over QPR
results.title: Leeds United 2-0 Queens Park Rangers: Tyler Roberts & Jack Harrison send Whites top

results.description: Sheffield Wednesday and Leeds United both miss the chance to go top of the Championship as their game ends goalless.
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday 0-0 Leeds United: Both sides miss chance to go top

results.description: Substitute Eddie Nketiah rescues a point for Leeds with a late equaliser against fellow promotion chasers Preston.
results.shortTitle: Nketiah goal earns Leeds draw at Preston
results.title: Preston North End 1-1 Leeds United: Eddie Nketiah scores late equaliser for Leeds

thumbnail.altText: Eddie Nketiah (left) is yet to start a Championship game for Leeds this season but has netted three goals in nine substitute appearances

results.description: Detectives are urging football fans with phone footage of the violence to share it with them.
results.shortTitle: Crowd trouble at Leeds 'worst in a decade'
results.title: Leeds v Birmingham: Trouble at Elland Road 'worst in a decade'

thumbnail.altText: Police and fans at Leeds United v Birmingham City (19.10.19)

results.description: Birmingham City fans clashed with police and stewards inside Elland Road at the final whistle.
results.shortTitle: Eleven arrested in trouble at Leeds stadium
results.title: Leeds v Birmingham: Police arrest 11 during trouble at game

thumbnail.altText: Police and fans at Leeds United v Birmingham City (19.10.19)

results.description: Kalvin Phillips' strike lifts Leeds to second in the table as the club marks their centenary with victory over Birmingham.
results.shortTitle: Leeds beat Birmingham in game marred by crowd trouble
results.title: Leeds 1-0 Birmingham: Kalvin Phillips strike lifts Leeds to second

results.description: Tram operator Stagecoach says the South Yorkshire club has ignored its safety recommendations.
results.title: Trams suspended for Sheffield Wednesday-Leeds United match

results.description: The Leeds United side of 1967-74 are awarded the freedom of the city to mark the club's 100th birthday.
results.shortTitle: Revie side awarded freedom of Leeds
results.title: Leeds United: 1967-74 side awarded freedom of city to mark club's 100th birthday

results.description: Thursday marks the 100th birthday of Leeds United - how much do you know about the Elland Road side?
results.shortTitle: How much do you know about 100 years of Leeds United?
results.title: Leeds United at 100: How much do you know about the Whites?

results.description: All the latest updates as events are held across the city to mark Leeds United's 100th anniversary.
results.title: Leeds United at 100: LUFC centenary celebrations

results.description: Leeds United could compete with Manchester City if proposed investment from the Middle East goes through, according to their owner.
results.shortTitle: Leeds can compete with Man City - owner
results.title: Andrea Radrizzani: Leeds United owner says they could compete with Manchester City

results.description: The EFL and their charity partner Mind are using street art in a bid to encourage conversations about mental health.
results.shortTitle: EFL and Mind launch street art campaign
results.title: World Mental Health Day: Street art campaign launched by English Football League

results.description: Leeds United defender Gaetano Berardi wins his appeal against his red card in Saturday's defeat by Millwall.
results.shortTitle: Leeds win appeal against Berardi red
results.title: Gaetano Berardi: Leeds United defender wins appeal against red card

results.description: Adam Barrett begins life as Millwall caretaker manager with a win as the Lions beat 10-man Leeds.
results.shortTitle: Millwall come through 'whirlwind' to upset Leeds
results.title: Millwall 2-1 Leeds United: Adam Barrett picks up win in first game as caretaker Lions boss

results.description: Ezgjan Alioski scores the only goal as Leeds end West Brom's unbeaten start and replace them at the top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Leeds beat Albion to replace them at top
results.title: Leeds United 1-0 West Bromwich Albion: Ezgjan Alioski goal sends Leeds top

thumbnail.altText: Ezgjan Alioski of Leeds United scores a goal to make it 1-0 against West Brom
